          <title>
            <string language="ca">Flipbook</string>
            <string language="en">Flipbook</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flipbook</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flipbook</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Flipbook</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Joc per combinar parts del cos de diferents personatges segmentats pel coll i la cintura.</string>
            <string language="en">A game to combine different parts of the body cut at neck- and waist-level.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>

          </keyword>

            <string language="es">percepción</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Spiel, zum der unterschiedlichen Körperteile
zu kombinieren schnitt am Ansatz und an der Taille-Stufe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu pour combiner différentes parties du 
corps a coupé au cou et au taille-niveau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo para combinar partes diferentes do corpo 
cortou na garganta e no cintura-nível.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco per unire le parti differenti del corpo 
ha tagliato al collo ed al vita-livello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι για να συνδυάσει τα διαφορετικά μέρη του
σώματος έκοψε στο λαιμό - και μέση-ισόπεδος.</string>
          </description>
